title: It's My Job to Find Great Nordstrom Items—These Sale Picks Will Elevate Any Closet
text: Part of my job as a fashion editor is being able to spot standout items among a sea of options—aka pieces that elevate a wardrobe and are worth the investment. I've spent years honing my skills to curate the best shopping recommendations for you, our readers. So, when I saw that Nordstrom's Winter Sale started this week, I decided to put my skills to good use.After scrolling through the entire sale section, I’m happy to report that there are plenty of chic staples currently marked down. From cashmere turtlenecks to tailored trousers and wool coats, Nordstrom came through with timeless pieces and quality basics guaranteed to stay in your wardrobe for years. With sale prices of up to 60% off, now is the time to add to your cart. Keep scrolling for the 31 most elevated closet staples from Nordstrom's Winter Sale (happening now through February 17). Happy shopping! Vince Isabel Pointed Toe Flat The pointed toes are so elegant. maje Long Double-Faced Coat With Belt Nordstrom Textured Boyfriend Blazer AGOLDE '90s Pinch Waist High Waist Straight Leg Jeans This silhouette is an editor favorite. COS Pelican Cash Turtleneck Cashmere Sweater Favorite Daughter The Favorite Pant Pleat Pants Pair with the above sweater for a monochromatic look. Treasure & Bond Relaxed Turtleneck Cotton Blend Sweater Dolce Vita Auggie Pointed Toe Knee High Boot If you don't have a good pair of tall black boots, this is your sign to get some. Reformation Auli Halter Top Pairs well with skirts and trousers. Veronica Beard Stila Ankle Pants Cigarette pants are having a resurgence. Hunza G Domino One-Piece Swimsuit Finding Hunza G on sale is rare, so take full advantage. Reiss Mischa Wool Blend Coat Reformation Sleeveless Cashmere Sweater With Scarf The spring version of the scarf top. Steve Madden Dusty Bootie Suede will continue to trend, and these boots are perfection. Caslon Cashmere Crewneck Sweater Reformation Reba Twill Waistcoat Open Edit Tailored Column Skirt Topshop Turtleneck Sweater Reformation Lila V-Neck Satin Dress Everyone needs an LBD in their closet. Steve Madden Bixby Pointed Toe Knee High Boot You just know the block heels are comfortable. I love this layered over a turtleneck. Reformation Halter Neck Vest A cool twist on a black vest. Calvin Klein Emery Mary Jane Flat LIONESS Field of Dreams Off the Shoulder Long Sleeve Maxi Dress This silhouette is so flattering. COS Oversize Longline Poplin Button-Up Shirt The styling possibilities are endless. Veronica Beard Watkins Tweed Dickey Jacket Tweed always looks elevated. Steve Madden Dagne Knee High Boot I can't resist those pointed toes. Topshop Cable Stitch Cardigan You can never have too many cardigans. MANGO Picarol Oversize Double Breasted Wool Blend Coat
html:
Part of my job as a fashion editor is being able to spot standout items among a sea of options—aka pieces that elevate a wardrobe and are worth the investment. I've spent years honing my skills to curate the best shopping recommendations for you, our readers. So, when I saw that Nordstrom's Winter Sale started this week, I decided to put my skills to good use.

After scrolling through the entire sale section, I’m happy to report that there are plenty of chic staples currently marked down. From cashmere turtlenecks to tailored trousers and wool coats, Nordstrom came through with timeless pieces and quality basics guaranteed to stay in your wardrobe for years. With sale prices of up to 60% off, now is the time to add to your cart. Keep scrolling for the 31 most elevated closet staples from Nordstrom's Winter Sale (happening now through February 17). Happy shopping!

Isabel Pointed Toe Flat

The pointed toes are so elegant.
